comments.author: Hailey Bell

top_comment.text:
Don't make Barbie get her cloths painted on because then she can't wear 
whatever she would like. And you know Barbie she loves fashion and always 
wants to change into her best which turns out to be the worst but still 
don't do it. Barbie might get very frustrated or angry or mad because she 
can't change. She will always be in that same old outfit if you get her 
cloths painted on. My point is, making Barbie get her cloths painted is not 
a good idea in my opinion.﻿

captions.text:
Hi everyone, it's me Barbie. Today I am having
an awkward shower situation please watch this

entire video and let me know what you think.
Should I get my clothes permanently painted

on like Elsa? After watching this whole video
please let me know in the comment section.

Woo hoo, go Barbie, go Barbie, feel the burn.
Yep, feel the burn. Elsa check it out i have

done a six minute mile. Woo hoo, hows it going
over there for you. I'm good, my legs are

just burning though. I think i might have
to stop pretty soon here. Oh I'm tired. Well

I just finished up my tenth mile so might
as well just head to the locker room and hit

the showers. Here Elsa you can stop to. Whoa
Barbie are you sure this is it? Um maybe.

It's like the worlds smallest locker room.
Well maybe there is something inside like

a giant shower, or something. Let's just open
it up and see. Whoa this place is weird. But

i think it does expand. So it might work.
Well i guess this is it. Its not as bad as

i thought it would be. Are we supposed to
shower in here? Yea, I'm trying to figure

this place out. You see it's just confusing
there is hooks on the wall here maybe for

your shoes. Or like boxing gloves, I don't
know. Oh hey this is a hidden jem. A full

length mirror hiding behind the locker that's
perfect. And then whoa the locker is stocked

with some nice perfume. This bench is pretty
handy too, I can do my stretches on here.

Or i can change out of my nasty sneakers into
my high heels. Yea, Barbie this place isn't

so bad, the vanity is really nice and it has
a chair, So you can sit down while doing your

hair. Whoa no way, inside this drawers are
some beauty products. Elsa we kind of have

a problem here. Look we both need to shower.
But the shower is missing a shower curtain.

What are we supposed to do? Look there is
hooks but no curtain, someone must have walk

off with it. Oh Barbie, I'm not that worried
about it. See i have my outfit painted on

me. So i don't need to worry about privacy,I
can just shower in my outfit. Well that's

all fine and dandy for you but I can't shower
in my gym clothes. Oh don't worry about it

Barbie. I can help you out. Maybe I can hold
up a towel so no one sees you naked while

you're showering. Elsa you are a genius. You
shower first though. Shower time. Okay Barbie

I am ready to take a shower but feel a little
weird to have you watch me shower, even though

I'm wearing my leotard. So can you maybe just
go out to the gym while i take my shower.

Yea, that's fine maybe i can go and work on
my six pack. Okay, i just got to climb in,

i hope they clean this thing regularly. *shower
noise* Alright, all set. Now It's Barbie's

turn. Barbie, Barbie, I'm done you can come
back in the locker room now. Woo Elsa that

was fast, I only had a chance to do 50 sit-ups
while you were showering. Well it's your turn

for the shower Barbie. Now Elsa no peeking
I am kind of self conscious about some of

my tattoos okay. So just hold up the towel
so if anyone walks in no one can see me naked.

*shower noise* Elsa Elsa come on wheres the
towel, I'm showering totally naked here with

no shower curtain. I'm coming, I'm coming
its just really hard to walk around with my

eyes closed Barbie. High high high heels.
High high high heels. Barbie, can you please

stop singing and concentrate on showering,
my arms are getting tired. Alright alright

I am almost done. Oh thank you so much for
holding up that towel, for me Elsa, so now

i can get dressed. Oh no peeking okay. I'm
not going to peek Barbie. Okay very well then.

Alright I'm dressed and ready to go home now.
And also I want to take a moment and say we

really need to sign up for another gym, one
that has money for a shower curtain. Or Barbie

you could always get your clothing painted
on like me. So kids what do you think. After

watching my whole scenario now. Should i just
get my clothes painted on or should i just

do a new gym. Please like this video and subscribe
to the Disney Cars Toy Channel. Click on a

picture to watch another fun toy video. Thanks
for watching and have a great day!

title: Barbie Shower and Locker Room Issues! Frozen Brunette Elsa Gym Workout by DisneyCarToys
